directions: Bring water to boil in medium saucepan on medium-high heat. Gradually stir in grits; cook on low heat 5 min., stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Add butter, garlic powder and pepper; stir until butter is completely melted and mixture is well blended.
Beat eggs in small bowl until blended. Add small amount of hot grits; mix well. Gradually add to remaining grits mixture in pan, stirring constantly until blended.
Pour into 8-inch square baking dish sprayed with cooking spray; top with VELVEETA.
Bake 40 min. Let stand 10 min. before serving.
title: VELVEETA® Cheesy Baked Grits
